EmailCooldown: 郵件服務冷卻中，請稍後重試。

InvalidEmailAddress: 輸入的電子郵件地址不合法。
InvalidUserName: The username can only contain numbers, underscores and English / Chinese / Japanese / Korean characters, and must be between 4 and 12 characters in length.
InvalidUrl: 輸入的内容不是合法的 URL。
InvalidPhoneNumber: The input value is not a valid phone number.
InvalidDate: The input value is not a valid date.
InvalidLanguageCode: The input value is not a valid language code.
UnsupportedLanguage: The specified language is not supported.
InvalidRegionCode: The input value is not a valid region code.
UnsupportedRegion: The specified region is not supported.
UnsupportedChartFormat: The format of the specified chart file is not supported.
UnsupportedLyricsFormat: The format of the specified lyrics is not supported.
ValueTooLong: The input value is longer than the maximum length allowed.
ValueTooShort: The input value is shorter than the minimum length allowed.
ValueOutOfRange: The input value is out of range.
UserNotFound: The specified user is not found.
ParentNotFound: The specified parent resource is not found.
ResourceNotFound: The specified resource is not found.
ConfigurationNotFound: The specified configuration is not found.
ApplicationNotFound: The specified application is not found.
RelationNotFound: The specified relation is not found.
InsufficientPermission: You do not have enough permission to perform the action.
InvalidCode: The code is invalid or has expired.
InvalidToken: The token is invalid or has expired.
Blacklisted: You have been blacklisted by the target user / resource owner.
InvalidAuthorInfo: You are not present in the author name!
RemoteFailure: Errors occurred whilst contacting remote servers.
BindingOccupied: The remote account has already been bound to another user.
ContentProhibited: There exists prohibited content in your input text.
